news.title: We might have to completely redraw the dinosaur family tree
news.summary: Normally the dinosaurian world is rocked by a new fossil -– the biggest, fastest, or toothiest.

news.title: Dinosaurs May Have Originated In The UK, Scientists Say
news.summary: We might have to re-write the dinosaur family tree. may have originated in an area that is now the UK, according to a groundbreaking study that could upend our understanding of their evolution.

news.title: We Might Have To Completely Redraw The Dinosaur Family Tree
news.summary: Michael J. Benton, University of Bristol Normally the dinosaurian world is rocked by a new fossil -- the biggest, fastest, or toothiest.

news.title: Dragon-like fossil discovery could change our view of dinosaur origins
news.summary: What did the ancestors of dinosaurs look like? For decades, our knowledge of close dinosaur relatives has been based largely on animals like the Triassic Period reptile Marasuchus, a tiny, squirrel-sized critter that moved rapidly on two legs.

news.title: Dragon-like fossil discovery could change our view of dinosaur origins
news.summary: More What did the ancestors of dinosaurs look like? For decades, our knowledge of close dinosaur relatives has been based largely on animals like the Triassic Period reptile Marasuchus, a tiny, squirrel-sized critter that moved rapidly on two legs.

blogs.title: Did dinosaurs originate in Scotland? Probably not.
blogs.summary: Written by Young Academy of Scotland member Steve Brusatte Last month, a Guardian headline proclaimed: ‘Radical shakeup of dinosaur family tree points to unexpected Scottish origins’. The article referred to a sensational new study of dinosaur
